cf.label: Provision for losses on finance receivables

Amount of the current period expense charged against operations for trade and contract receivables, the offset which is generally to the corresponding allowance for doubtful accounts for the purpose of reducing receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value (the amount expected to be collected).
